title: Any 3150-4800 Champs that are good in YOUR Opinion..
body: So recently I have saved up for {{champion:74}} *Heimerdinger* and he's pretty good. I have always played league everyday, 12 hours a day and I just reached a certain amount that is close to **3150**. I can save up to **4800** also :D..... So now I have to figure out which champ is good, I want to hear any champs from you guys! :D Any champ in Your **Opinion**. I would really appreciate it if you at least put a list of champs that are good. It can be any single type except a low damage. High Damge, AP, ADC, etc.  :D Thanks

replies.body: Any champion in that price range EXCEPT {{champion:6}}
Wow way to reject the most OP champ of all time. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
J4, Fizz, Caitlyn, Graves come to  mind atm
There are waaaay too many good champs in that price range to list them all. Mind adding a little more info about what you want? You want high dmg, sustain, aoe, cc...etc.
